channel.title: 2006 Remade - 2006 replica
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://2006remade.com/img/title2/rslogo3.gif[/img]
[URL=http://www.2006remade.com]Website[/URL] 2006Remade Alpha will launch on [b]July 15, 2013[/b].
2006Remade is a 2006 replica, also known as a "remake". We have been around since 2012 and are still updating weekly, weather it's forum updates, or in-game updates. We strive to prefect our content to it's best ability to make sure you get the best hassle free nostalgia gaming experience in your life!
[b][u]Our development log:[/u][/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img] [b]Combat:[/b] - PvP fully complete - PvN fully Complete - Equipment requirements - Perfect max hit formulas - Perfect accuracy formula
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] [b]Magic:[/b] - Every Modern spell - Every Ancient spell - Can't mage through wall's
[img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] [b]Range:[/b] - All bow/arrow's working - Can't range through walls - Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] [b]Prayer:[/b] - All bones bury-able - All prayer's working correctly - Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b]Mining:[/b] - Empty and refilling rock's - All ore can be mined - Correct pickaxe finding and animation's - Prospecting - Random chance of obtaining gem's - Rune essence - Granite - SandStone
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [b]Smithing:[/b] - All bar's can be smelted - All bar's can be forged into item's - All equipment can be produced - Correct animation's, interface's and object's used
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [b]Fishing:[/b] - All fish can be caught - All fishing location's - Correct animation's - Moving fishing location's
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [b]Cooking:[/b] - Bread - Pizza - Pie - Cake - Stew - Wine - Tea - Brewing - Potatoes - Diary - Gnome - Dough making - Meat/fish - Correct animation and timing used - Correct burn rate
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img] [b]Woodcutting:[/b] - All tree's cut-able - Stumps and re-growing tree's - Correct axe finding and animation's - Bird's nest
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [b]Firemaking:[/b] - All log's light-able - Correct ground object's - Correct animation's - Ashe's
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [b]Crafting:[/b] - Leather crafting - Tanning - Spinning wheel - Pottery (fired and un-fired item's) - Gem cutting - Jewelry - Glass making - Battlestaff making (air, water, earth and fire) - Weaving
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [b]Runecrafting:[/b] - All altar's working - Correct multiple crafting - Talisman's "pull" to altar's - Tiara's - Pouch's - Abyss
[img]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img] [b]Fletching:[/b] - All log's can be fletched - Bow stringing - Arrow/dart making
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img] [b]Thieving:[/b] - Stall thieving - Pick-pocketing - Correct re-spawn time
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img] [b]Herblore:[/b] - All potion's make-able - Identifying herbs - Weapon poisoning
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HtjDm.gif[/img] [b]Slayer:[/b] - All slayer master's - All slayer Monster's - Slayer gem - Slayer shop - Slayer level to attack slayer monster's
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img] [b]Agility:[/b] - Todo
[img]http://i.imgur.com/NYu86.gif[/img] [b]Farming:[/b] - Todo
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [b]Quest:[/b] - Tutorial Island - Cook's Assistant - Doric's Quest - Sheep Shearer - Witch's Potion
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img] [b]Music & sounds:[/b] - All skilling sound's - All combat sound's - Working music player and unlocking - Music playing in all region's - Music fade and volume control
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img] [b]Random events:[/b] - Rock golem, River troll, Tree spirit, Shade and Zombie random's.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img] [b]Misc.:[/b] - Hiscores - Integration - Pick-able's - Flour mill - Door's, gate's, stair's and ladder's - Global drop's - Sheep shearing - Clipping - More to come...
[b][u]Media:[/u][/b]
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/4pziao.png[/img]
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/51x311.png[/img]
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2aj9wnc.png[/img]
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2r7u3yp.png[/img]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2mya2c.png[/img]
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/34r8xmg.png[/img]
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/anvj6.png[/img]
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2urp4p1.png[/img]
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2rgnx4w.png[/img]
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/1z4g95u.png[/img]
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2w1tmok.png[/img]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/qn75zs.png[/img]
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/el8d8h.png[/img]
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2jcv5zt.png[/img]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ED4rOrnVSUE[/youtube]

item.title: 2006 Remade - 2006 replica
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

[center]

Website
2006Remade Alpha will launch on July 15, 2013.

2006Remade is a 2006 replica, also known as a “remake”. We have been around since 2012 and are still updating weekly, weather it’s forum updates, or in-game updates. We strive to prefect our content to it’s best ability to make sure you get the best hassle free nostalgia gaming experience in your life!

Our development log:

Combat:

  • PvP fully complete
  • PvN fully Complete
  • Equipment requirements
  • Perfect max hit formulas
  • Perfect accuracy formula

Magic:

  • Every Modern spell
  • Every Ancient spell
  • Can’t mage through wall’s

Range:

  • All bow/arrow’s working
  • Can’t range through walls
  • Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)

Prayer:

  • All bones bury-able
  • All prayer’s working correctly
  • Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate

Mining:

  • Empty and refilling rock’s
  • All ore can be mined
  • Correct pickaxe finding and animation’s
  • Prospecting
  • Random chance of obtaining gem’s
  • Rune essence
  • Granite
  • SandStone

Smithing:

  • All bar’s can be smelted
  • All bar’s can be forged into item’s
  • All equipment can be produced
  • Correct animation’s, interface’s and object’s used

Fishing:

  • All fish can be caught
  • All fishing location’s
  • Correct animation’s
  • Moving fishing location’s

Cooking:

  • Bread
  • Pizza
  • Pie
  • Cake
  • Stew
  • Wine
  • Tea
  • Brewing
  • Potatoes
  • Diary
  • Gnome
  • Dough making
  • Meat/fish
  • Correct animation and timing used
  • Correct burn rate

Woodcutting:

  • All tree’s cut-able
  • Stumps and re-growing tree’s
  • Correct axe finding and animation’s
  • Bird’s nest

Firemaking:

  • All log’s light-able
  • Correct ground object’s
  • Correct animation’s
  • Ashe’s

Crafting:

  • Leather crafting
  • Tanning
  • Spinning wheel
  • Pottery (fired and un-fired item’s)
  • Gem cutting
  • Jewelry
  • Glass making
  • Battlestaff making (air, water, earth and fire)
  • Weaving

Runecrafting:

  • All altar’s working
  • Correct multiple crafting
  • Talisman’s “pull” to altar’s
  • Tiara’s
  • Pouch’s
  • Abyss

Fletching:

  • All log’s can be fletched
  • Bow stringing
  • Arrow/dart making

Thieving:

  • Stall thieving
  • Pick-pocketing
  • Correct re-spawn time

Herblore:

  • All potion’s make-able
  • Identifying herbs
  • Weapon poisoning

Slayer:

  • All slayer master’s
  • All slayer Monster’s
  • Slayer gem
  • Slayer shop
  • Slayer level to attack slayer monster’s

Agility:

  • Todo

Farming:

  • Todo

Quest:

  • Tutorial Island
  • Cook’s Assistant
  • Doric’s Quest
  • Sheep Shearer
  • Witch’s Potion

Music & sounds:

  • All skilling sound’s
  • All combat sound’s
  • Working music player and unlocking
  • Music playing in all region’s
  • Music fade and volume control

Random events:

  • Rock golem, River troll, Tree spirit, Shade and Zombie random’s.

Misc.:

  • Hiscores
  • Integration
  • Pick-able’s
  • Flour mill
  • Door’s, gate’s, stair’s and ladder’s
  • Global drop’s
  • Sheep shearing
  • Clipping
  • More to come…
